keyword: how many calories are in sausage mcmuffin
title: How Many Calories Are in a Sausage McMuffin?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in sausage mcmuffin, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, fat, carbs, and sodium from McDonald's standard serving.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Sausage McMuffin?
assumptions: McDonald's Sausage McMuffin with Egg; English muffin, pork sausage patty, American cheese, whole egg; standard preparation, no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and custom orders. Check McDonald's app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One Sausage McMuffin provides about 480 kcal, 21 g protein, and 30 g carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Canadian bacon instead of pork sausage

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Sausage McMuffin with Egg?
faqs.a: Approximately 480 kcal for the standard McDonald's version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a sausage mcmuffin?
faqs.a: About 21 g of protein per serving.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in sausage mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Around 1030 mg, mostly from the sausage and cheese.

faqs.q: Does Sausage McMuffin have trans fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 0.5 g per serving from the sausage.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in sausage mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Yes, 30 g total, mainly from the English muffin, with 2 g fiber.
